name: Big Mac
description: Two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun.

name: McChicken
description: A crispy chicken fillet topped with lettuce and mayonnaise in a sesame seed bun.

name: Filet-O-Fish
description: A fish fillet topped with tartar sauce and a half-slice of cheese in a steamed bun.

name: Chicken McNuggets
description: Tender, juicy chicken McNuggets served with your choice of dipping sauce.

name: McDouble
description: Two beef patties, cheese, onions, pickles, mustard, and ketchup in a double cheeseburger.

name: Quarter Pounder with Cheese
description: A quarter-pound beef patty with cheese, pickles, onions, mustard, and ketchup in a sesame seed bun.

name: McFlurry Oreo
description: Vanilla soft-serve mixed with crushed Oreo cookies for a delicious dessert.

name: Fries
description: Golden, crispy McDonald's fries, served medium-sized.

name: Apple Pie
description: A warm, flaky pie filled with delicious apple filling.

name: Sausage McMuffin
description: A savory sausage patty, egg, and cheese in a toasted English muffin.

name: Coca-Cola
description: A refreshing medium-sized Coca-Cola drink to complement your meal.

name: Hotcakes with Syrup
description: Delicious hotcakes served with butter and syrup for a delightful breakfast.

name: Spicy McChicken
description: A spicy twist on the classic McChicken sandwich with a spicy mayo kick.

name: Filet-O-Shrimp
description: A shrimp patty topped with lettuce and tartar sauce in a steamed bun.

name: Happy Meal
description: A kid's meal with a choice of burger, chicken nuggets, or other options, accompanied by a toy.

name: McVeggie Burger
description: A vegetarian burger option with a patty made from a blend of vegetables and grains.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee with ice, perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up.

name: Chicken Salad
description: A healthy salad option with grilled chicken, fresh greens, and a variety of vegetables.

name: Chocolate Sundae
description: Creamy chocolate soft-serve topped with rich chocolate syrup.

name: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
description: A tropical smoothie blend of mango and pineapple for a fruity delight.
